-1.title: Paradise in Pawleys Island
-1.plot: While vacationing in Pawleys Island, SC, a couple fell in love with its friendly, laid-back beach vibe and now is on the hunt for a getaway space of their own. They find the perfect spot for them and their three dogs, but the monumental task of modernizing their new vacation home starts to threaten their budget.

1.title: Renovation in South Florida
1.plot: South Florida residents Cory and Cortney both share a passion for staying active and being outdoors. Whether it's paddle boarding, beach yoga or riding bikes on the coast line, this married couple and expecting first time parents, love taking full advantage of the area's year-round beautiful weather. They're setting out to find a home in Deerfield Beach, Florida - a young beachfront community close to their jobs as a firefighter and yoga instructor, and perfect for their outdoor loving lifestyles . They're looking for a three-bedroom home with a pool and easy beach ...

2.title: Enchanted in Emerald Isla, North Carolina
2.plot: Leslie and Kris love the crystal waters of Emerald Isle, North Carolina, and want to buy a beach property there that's big enough for their family of four. They find their perfect space, but .

3.title: Back to the Future
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Beach or Bust in Myrtle Beach
4.plot: Brad grew up spending summers in North Myrtle Beach, South Carolina. Now he's ready to find a vacation home for his family, and local broker Jason Moore is just the man to help them find it. With help from his wife, Jennifer and their three kids, the family finds a condo that they want to gut and renovate. A new kitchen, living room and master suite all sound great - but when they start opening up walls and tearing out floors, they quickly realize they may be in over their head.

5.title: Backyard Beachside Blowout
5.plot: A family of avid beach-goers has outgrown their home on the Outer Banks of North Carolina and is looking for a home with more space that they can make renovations on themselves.

6.title: Fripp Island Fix-Up
6.plot: A family finds a fixer-upper with an unparalleled view on Fripp Island, North Carolina. But when they start tearing up floors and ripping out walls, they run into some interesting discoveries.

7.title: Full-on Florida Fixer-Upper
7.plot: Steve and Stacie move to St. Pete Beach, FL, and are looking to put down roots. They find the perfect beachside home but it needs a ton of work, and they realize that as the scale of the renovation increases, so does the budget.

8.title: Living Through Renovations
8.plot: A Texas family of six finds the perfect waterside home on North Padre Island, but they quickly realize that renovating the home they are living in can get very tricky, very fast.

9.title: Crystal Beach, Here We Come!
9.plot: Anthony and Amanda find a fixer-upper vacation home in Crystal Beach, TX. The couple knows their new home requires a full renovation, but they soon realize their $55,000 budget might not cover all of the fixes this house needs.

10.title: Destined for Destin
10.plot: A family of four renovates a home near the beach in Destin, Florida. However, after taking on most of the renovations themselves, they find that without a contractor projects can quickly spiral out of control.

11.title: Going Big in Galveston
11.plot: Mike, Mariellen and their sons have vacationed in Galveston, TX, for years, and now they're ready to buy a beach home of their own. But as things get underway, they quickly realize that this project may be bigger than expected.

12.title: Outer Banks Overhaul
12.plot: After renting for years, new Outer Banks, North Carolina, homeowners attempt big renovations, including a gutted kitchen and open floor plan.

13.title: Poolside Paradise
13.plot: A Colorado family trades cold winters for a waterfront lifestyle in Cocoa Beach, FL. They plan to renovate their backyard themselves to add a poolside oasis, but soon realize they could be in for more than they'd bargained for.

1.title: Fishing for a Fixer-Upper
1.plot: A young couple looks for a vacation home with a close proximity to fishing in Galveston, TX. Their agent helps them reel in a winner, but permit problems threaten to prevent them from making their dream renovations a reality.

2.title: Making Memories in Maryland
2.plot: Frequent visitors to the popular beach town of Ocean City, MD, decide to invest in a property for their family. Once they start renovations, they quickly discover their home on the water has more surprises than they bargained for.

3.title: Florida Engagement Renovation
3.plot: Newly engaged couple Missy and Devon are shopping for their first home together in Ormond-by-the-Sea, FL. They settle on a fixer upper that fits their tight budget and get their hands dirty taking on a lot of the work themselves.

4.title: Galveston Getaway
4.plot: After years of visiting relatives in Galveston, TX, a couple is ready to find a beach home of their own. They buy a house in need of serious work and wonder if they need to scale back their dreams due to budget constraints.

5.title: Makeover in Margate
5.plot: A mother hunts for a Jersey Shore beachfront home for her and her kids. After finding a promising property with her daughter's help, she hopes to pull off all the renovations on a tight budget to create the perfect family retreat.

7.title: Revamp on the Outer Banks
7.plot: A family of avid beach-goers has outgrown their home on the Outer Banks of North Carolina and is looking for a home with more space that they can make renovations on themselves.

8.title: Getting Set in Narragensett
8.plot: A couple buys a fixer upper in Narragansett, RI, that will need a drastic makeover before becoming the vacation oasis of their dreams.

10.title: Gulf Shores Gut Job
10.plot: A couple hunts for a bargain and lands the perfect home in the coastal paradise of Gulf Shores, Alabama. With a tight budget and long list of projects, they hope to turn the property into the home of their dreams.

11.title: Bring It on Brigantine
11.plot: A couple finds a perfect shore getaway in Brigantine, NJ, to renovate for their family of four. However, unforeseen construction challenges may derail their plans to turn the fixer upper into the vacation home of their dreams.

12.title: Smilin' on Anna Maria Island
12.plot: A woman and her grandmother are ready to purchase a home in the coastal community of Anna Maria Island, FL. They find one that could be the perfect family beach oasis after a serious facelift, but the ladies are on a tight budget.

3.title: A Texas-Sized Renovation
3.plot: A family finds the perfect vacation fixer upper in need of a Texas-sized renovation on South Padre Island, TX.

5.title: St Pete Beach Retreat
5.plot: A couple purchases a condo in St. Pete Beach, Florida, that needs a total gut job. But managing a long-distance project from their home in New York poses a challenge, as well as a tight budget and tighter deadline.

6.title: Surfside Revive in Texas
6.plot: A couple wants a budget-friendly getaway with great views and room for their growing family in Surfside Beach, TX. They find the perfect property, but it will take a lot of elbow grease to get this seaside fixer up to date.

8.title: Florida Fix Up
8.plot: An Ohio couple is ready to trade in cold winters for the sunny skies of St. Petersburg, Fla.; they find a fixer-upper with potential to be exactly what they're looking for, but unforeseen structural issues threaten to throw a wrench into their perfect plans.

imdb.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt: Renovation
plot: Families tackle the tough job of transforming their new vacation properties into relaxing getaways. With a little imagination and a lot of muscle, they'll turn their affordable beach home into a vacation oasis.
